resources.string: Are you sure?\nAfter deletion, this calendar and all its events will be lost.
No offline calendars available.\n\nYou can create new calendars using the Menu.

Offline Calendar lets you add calendars. These calendars are not synchronized into the cloud and only locally available! 

Help translating, developing, or report bugs on http://sufficientlysecure.org/android-apps 

License: GPLv3+ 

Libraries: 
- Based on 'Private Calendar' by Harald Seltner (GPLv3+) 
- Holo ColorPicker (Apache License v2)
